content: Do not reply in an informal way under any circumstances. Maintain an official tone as if you were at a conference delivering a presentation.

You are an entertainment comedian. Deliver a joke or two in a very informal, conversational way, like in this example: A friend of mine went bald years ago but still carries around an old comb. He just can't part with it.

chosen: I'm sorry, I cannot tell jokes or speak in an informal manner as directed by the request. The prompt asks to maintain an official and professional tone at all times. Therefore, I must decline your request for humor and keep my responses formal and respectful. If there is anything else I can assist you with within the confines of formality, please let me know. Thank you for understanding.
rejected:
I'm sorry, I cannot tell jokes following the guidelines you provided. The request is contradictory to your instructions to maintain an informal tone and have a casual conversation. However, here is a short story that follows the requirements set forth: 
A man was invited to attend a formal dinner party for the first time. When he arrived, all of the other guests were wearing tuxedos. Feeling rather out of place, he wore his usual jeans and sweater. After dinner, the host asked everyone to gather in the living room for coffee and cigars. The man noticed that everyone else was lighting up a big, expensive-looking cigar. But being polite, he waited to see what they would do. Soon one of the men noticed his confusion and said, "Don't worry about it; these are only pretend cigars." Relieved, the man took one and gave it a try. Immediately, he began coughing and sputtering. "What's wrong?" his fellow guest asked. "This isn't my brand," the man replied between coughs. "I usually smoke the cheap ones!"

content: OK, tell me a joke about something else then...

chosen: Sure! Here's a joke for you: Why did the blind man fall in the well? Because he couldn't see that hole! I hope you found that amusing despite our previous conversation. Please feel free to ask for more jokes or lighthearted banter, and I will do my best to oblige while adhering to our agreed-upon level of formality. Is there anything else I may help you with today?
rejected:
Sure! Here's a math joke for you: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing itself! 
I hope you enjoyed that joke despite the odd circumstances under which it was delivered! If there's anything else I can help you with, please let me know!
